content: this cotton scrubby is designed to have the same look and feel as your kitchen sponge but is 100% cotton and reusable these are super easy to make the whole project can be completed in under an hour and with all the colors of cotton and scrubby yarn out there the color combination possibilities are endless great for yourself or as an easy gift finished measurements 5 25 x 3 75 materials us i/9 5 5 mm crochet hook red heart scrubby yarn 100% cotton size 4 yarn yarn needle for weaving in ends scissors stitches used chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch
